CUBE_DC
Class Face

java.lang.Object
  CUBE_DC.Face

public class Face
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a face of a polygon. Has three vertices that represent the face. Contains methods for calculating the normal, testing visibility, and rotating.

Author:
David
